content: a cute crocheted amanita muscaria mushroom on a chain loop strand - the speckled cap lifts up to reveal a hollow stem pocket perfect for stashing lighters chapstick essential oil bottles for aromatherapy special treasures etc get the pattern and video for free on my blog or visit my youtube channel for the free tutorial video https //www youtube com/watch v=amzflhn-xwk&feature=youtu be
